doc:
Jack Kelly (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Kelly_(actor) 0 John Augustus Kelly Jr. (September 16, 1927 – November 7, 1992), best known as Jack Kelly, was an American film and television actor most noted for the role of "Bart Maverick" in the television series Maverick, which ran on ABC from 1957-62. Kelly shared the series, rotating as the lead from week to week, first with James Garner as Bret Maverick (1957–1960) then with Roger Moore as Beau Maverick (1960–1961) and Robert Colbert as Brent Maverick (1961, for two episodes), before becoming the only Maverick (alternating with repeats from the Garner era) in the fifth season. Kelly later became a politician, having served from 1983 to 1986 as the mayor of Huntington Beach, California. John_Augustus_Kelly_Jr. ( September_16_,_1927 – November_7_,_1992 ) , best_known as Jack_Kelly , was an_American_film_and_television_actor most_noted for the_role of "_Bart_Maverick " in the_television_series_Maverick , which ran on ABC from 1957-62 . Kelly shared the_series , rotating as the_lead from week to week , first with James_Garner as Bret_Maverick_(_1957 – 1960 ) then with Roger_Moore as Beau_Maverick_(_1960 – 1961_)_and_Robert_Colbert as Brent_Maverick_(_1961 , for two_episodes_) , before becoming the_only_Maverick_( alternating with repeats from the_Garner_era_) in the_fifth_season . Kelly later became a_politician , having_served from 1983 to 1986 as the_mayor of Huntington_Beach , California .
